header.content: Loveleo rescue are a non profit dog rehoming agency and where I rescued my dog Blue.

body.content: After making an instagram post asking for assistance with the admin portion of their Wordpress admin, I offered some of my spare time to worked along side the founders to simplify things.

blocks.content: Loveleo rescue have been doing the amazing work of rescuing and rehoming dogs for almost ten years. After seeing an Instagram post requesting assistance, I jumped at the chance to help updating their current out of date Wordpress site.

I installed a brand new version of Wordpress and created a new child theme where we could make edits without incorporating breaking changes. I added advanced custom fields to give them instructions on how to use each of the features implemented and helped tidy up some small UI anomalies that were bothering them.
We still have a good relation and I help out from time to time if any problems arise.
